text: Berit Larsson (born April 1944) is a former Swedish long track speed skater, who was active in the 1960s. Larsson represented her nation at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1962, finishing 25th overall. She also competed at other international competitions. She competed at the 1960 and 1962 Swedish Allround Championships, with the best result in 1962 finishing fourth. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Swedish female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Berit Larsson
